title: Frank Bruni | Biden Warns Putin "Has No Idea What's Coming," Greene & Boebert Heckle SOTU: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Biden using his first State of the Union address to condemn Vladimir Putin's invasion of Ukraine and warn him that he has no idea what the U.S. and its allies will do next.

Then, writer Frank Bruni talks about losing the vision in his right eye, how he processed the loss through his memoir The Beauty of Dusk and finding out that Oprah Winfrey is a fan.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
